name: SinisterSacrifice(Demo)
description:
What would you do if you woke up locked in a room, struggling to breathe? Play as Eduard, and endure the brute torture of Sinister Sacrifice, a demon that has forced him to live with guilt, trying to steal his soul. Will you be able to finish this sinister ritual?

Please support us <3
